#summary Use case for creating a new Lexicon entry.
#labels UseCase,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

*Description:*

Adds a new Lexicon entry to the system.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has the role of Administrator.
 # The user is logged into the administration interface.
 # The user is viewing the Add New Lexicon page.

*Postconditions:*
 # A new Lexicon with the entered key and value will exist in the database.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # User wants to add a new Lexicon entry.
 # User selects the appropriate language for the new Lexicon.
 # User selects the appropriate topic for the new Lexicon.
 # User enters a unique key value for the Lexicon.
 # User enters the internationalized text for the Lexicon.
 # User submits the form.
 # The system verifies that the selected language exists in the database.
 # the system verifies that the selected topic exists in the database.
 # The system verifies that the entered key is unique for the language and topic.
 # The system adds the Lexicon entry to the database.
 # The system deletes the Lexicon cache file for the language and topic.
 # The system displays a success page to the user.
 # Use case ends.
